items.content_html: A simple, lightweight tool for API documentation and testing, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ideal for visualizing, interacting with, and evaluating API endpoints and responses, it offers a streamlined alternative to complex platforms like Swagger, perfect for small to medium projects.
items.title: andreMc05/api_tunnel: A simple, lightweight tool for API documentation and testing, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ideal for visualizing, interacting with, and evaluating API endpoints and responses, it offers a streamlined alternative to complex platforms like Swagger, perfect for small to medium projects.

items.title: bostonc/stepful_mern_app: A lightweight, full-stack application including client, server, and database to create a sample scheduling platform.

items.content_html: Chainadres is a lightweight and secure wallet sender app designed for sending transactions on blockchain networks. This application simplifies the process of initiating transactions by providing an intuitive interface to interact with blockchain wallets.
items.title: criptichood/chainadres: Chainadres is a lightweight and secure wallet sender app designed for sending transactions on blockchain networks. This application simplifies the process of initiating transactions by providing an intuitive interface to interact with blockchain wallets.

items.content_html: ZilaWS is a blazingly fast and very lightweight library that provides an extremely easy-to-use way to transmit data via websockets between clientside and serverside using eventhandlers and async waiters.
items.title: ZilaWS/client: ZilaWS is a blazingly fast and very lightweight library that provides an extremely easy-to-use way to transmit data via websockets between clientside and serverside using eventhandlers and async waiters.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js module for synchronizing a local directory with a Google Drive folder. This module handles OAuth2 authentication, monitors the specified directory for new file additions, and uploads them to the designated Google Drive folder. Ideal for automating file backups and syncing tasks
items.title: nishangraiyani/google-drive-sync-directory: A lightweight Node.js module for synchronizing a local directory with a Google Drive folder. This module handles OAuth2 authentication, monitors the specified directory for new file additions, and uploads them to the designated Google Drive folder. Ideal for automating file backups and syncing tasks
